radirius.merc.environment

Interface Renderable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckBox, Component, ImageButton, NewLine, Panel, Particle, ParticleEmitter, RadioCheckBox, TextBar, TextBox, TextButton, TextField, Window

    public interface Renderable
    An abstraction for objects that can be rendered.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(Graphics g)
      The render method.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Graphics g)
        The render method. In here there should be peripheral activity, such as graphics, or sound, given g.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object.
